title: transition-timing-function
description: The `transition-timing-function` CSS property specifies the pace and rhythm of a transition effect.
content: The property that defines the speed curve of a transition, controlling how the transition progresses over time. Common values include 'linear', 'ease', 'ease-in', 'ease-out' and 'ease-in-out', which affect the acceleration and deceleration of the transition.
